Package com.github.checkit.dao

Class BaseDao<T extends HasIdentifier>

java.lang.Object
com.github.checkit.dao.BaseDao<T>
Type Parameters:
T - the entity class this DAO manages
All Implemented Interfaces:
GenericDao<T>
Direct Known Subclasses:
CommentDao, GestoringRequestDao, ChangeDao, NotificationDao, ProjectContextDao, PublicationContextDao, UserDao, VocabularyContextDao, VocabularyDao
public abstract class BaseDao<T extends HasIdentifier> extends Object implements GenericDao<T>
Base implementation of the generic DAO API.

    • getReference

      public Optional<T> getReference(URI id)
      Description copied from interface: GenericDao
      Gets a reference to an instance with the specified identifier.

      Note that the reference is initially an empty object wth all attributes loaded lazily and the corresponding persistence context has to be available for the loading. This method should be useful for removal and update operations.

      Specified by:
      getReference in interface GenericDao<T extends HasIdentifier>
      Parameters:
      id - Identifier
      Returns:
      Optional containing a reference to a matching instance or an empty Optional if no such instance exists
